posts.text:
#ClaudeCode
#Anthropic @AnthropicAI I’m stuck because there doesn’t seem to be a reachable customer service channel (no response to emails yet). If there’s a correct escalation path for Team/Max usage/billing issues, please point me to it. https://t.co/sjOmxBUwiA

Claude Team/Max: weekly budget (UI ~5h) hit 100% fast. 28 Jan: Weekly 33% 18:13 → 100% 19:56 (~103m). @AnthropicAI can you check shared pool / weighted metering / Code+tool loops / delayed UI catch-up? CSV+timestamps available. #ClaudeAI #Anthropic #ClaudeCode #UsageLimits

top_features.why_it_matters: Newly created accounts can indicate disposable amplification actors.
High text reuse is a common indicator of scripted posting.
Very high posting velocity can indicate automated behavior.
